alert.note: Alert for Butler; Franklin (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 3:59PM CDT until June 24 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL FRANKLIN AND NORTHWESTERN BUTLER COUNTIES... At 358 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hansell, or near Hampton, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Dumont, Aredale and Bristow. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for north central Iowa. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
